banner.heading: Hi, my name is Alen.
subheading: I'm a web developer from Sydney.

about.heading: About me
aboutText: My name is Alen Basar, I'm a young Sydney based web developer eager to learn and grow. I am extremely passionate about web development, programming and software in general.
How did I get into web development?
Well, I always wanted to make money by being creative, and I already had some experience with programming, so I figured why not make websites?
What are the technologies I have experience dealing with?

The journey through the world of web development started with learing fundamental front-end technologies (HTML, CSS and JavaScript), probably like every other web developer. After getting solid knowledge of fundamental languages I chose to learn React.js, PHP, SQL and more.
